main.name: GHG Emission Reduction Tool for Apparel Industries
main.description: Reduce the carbon footprint of your products for a better world
main.bio: The main objective of this tool is to develop a methodology for obtaining a low carbon energy mix to reduce a certain GHG emission with minimum cost for Sri Lankan apparel industries. This includes quantifying the current GHG emission of the factory, providing the system sizes for desired emission limit, providing the financial evaluation of suggesting low carbon energy mix.
main.contactmessage: If you have any problems or any suggesstions with this tool,contact us.
main.step2: To calculate the current onsite emission,insert annualy electricity consumption, deisel consumption and boiler consumption. (Use the given templetes for the user inputs.)
main.step3: After giving the 3 inputs, the tool calculate the current onsite emission.
main.step4: Next you should set the required emission target according to science based target.And fill the required inputs.
main.step5: Finally it generates the optimized system's GHG emission,system sizing and cost analysis.
